Interface ec.encoding.StandardDecoder

public interface interface StandardDecoder
extends Decoder
A StandardDecoder is an extension to Decoder to make it easy to add body processing without defining a special DecodeResult. The deal is that a StandardDecoder should return a ContinueDecoding, which, in turn, calls back on the StandardDecoder to decode the body.

See Also:
ContinueDecoding

decodeBody(Object, Object[])
Decode the body of the given object.

decodeBody 
 public abstract void decodeBody(Object theInstance,
                                 Object bodyArgs[])
Decode the body of the given object. This is called by ContinueDecoding.decodeBody.

Parameters:
theInstance - the instance to finish instantiating
bodyArgs - the body arguments of the desired instance
